Leo Morris
==========

![Leo Morris](https://www.marshalltexas.net/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=3140)



Leo Morris, District 2
----------------------

: 2024 to 2028
[Email Leo Morris](mailto:morris.leo@marshalltexas.net)

Leo Morris was born in Marshall. He graduated from Lincoln High School in Dallas and attended Texas Southern University in Houston, Texas majoring in sociology. Upon his return to Marshall, he also a
Council Member Morris attends Grand Way Church of Christ.

Mr. Morris worked for 28 years for the City of Houston as a Field Supervisor in the Public Works department. He retired in 2003.

* [City Council](https://www.marshalltexas.net/220/City-Council)
